wht is a 7 zip?
what is a 7 zip?

7zip is a free compressing, or decompressing tool that works with zip, 7zip or rar formats, to name a few.
(note: decompressing = extracting)

about the error, i don't know but perhaps it is your extractor that wasn't installed (or working) correctly.
